items.title: Boeing Restarts 737 MAX Shipments to China
items.description: The Boeing Company (NYSE:BA) is one of the best Dow stocks to invest in. On June 9, a Boeing 737 MAX aircraft landed in China, marking what appears to be the resumption of deliveries to Chinese airlines after a pause linked to trade tensions between the US and China.
